item.description:
Dear Member,

How are you?

Autumn is here. Wish you enjoy your time with nice warm weather before it gets colder.

One of our member who is hosting this wonderful group. This group has been bring back the ancient wisdom to now-a-day.

It is a discussion group which brings out  more of wisdom of Tao.

Here is the chapter 65:

The ancients who practiced the Tao
did not use it to enlighten the people,
but rather to assist them in gaining simplicity.
The reason people are difficult to govern
is because they are too clever.

Hence, a person who attempts to govern
a country by cleverness will injure it.
Those who govern without cleverness
will be a blessing to the land.
These are the two models.
Knowing these models is called the Mystic Virtue.
The Mystic Virtue is deep and so far-reaching
that it can lead all things back toward great harmony.       

 

If you like to join me for discussion, we can car pool.

 

Take care

   Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: Please contact me, if you are going. 617-223-7166. It is in Quincy!!!!
item.name: TaoTe Ching October discussion
